title: Plate

plate_type.title: plate_type
plate_type.description: The type of plate, such as microtiter plate, deep-well plate, or others.

plate_material.title: plate_material
plate_material.description: The material from which the plate is made, such as plastic (polystyrene), glass, or metal.

number_of_wells.title: number_of_wells
number_of_wells.description: The total number of wells or cavities in the plate.

well_shape.title: well_shape
well_shape.descrption: The shape of the wells, such as round, rectangular, square, etc.

well_volume.title: well_volume
well_volume.description: The volume of each well is, usually expressed in ÂµL (microliters).

well_arrangement.title: well_arrangement
well_arrangement.description: The arrangement of the wells in the plate, for example, in rows and columns.

supplier.title: supplier
supplier.description: Information about the supplier from which the plate was purchased.

lot_number.title: lot_number
lot_number.description: The lot number, also known as a batch number or code, is a unique identifier assigned to a specific batch of a product. This makes it possible to check or track information on production.

sealing_method.title: sealing_method
sealing_method.description: Indicate if the wells were sealed with a sealing film or lid. (

sealing_material.title: sealing_material
sealing_material.description: The material of the sealing film or lid. (

special_treatment.title: special_treatment
special_treatment.description: If there are any other specific methods, procedures, characteristics or aspects related to the plate or its preparation for the reaction that are important for reproducibility and are not                    described by the aforementioned metadata, they should be explained here.

description: It's crucial to provide detailed information about the plate type, material, well configuration, and other relevant specifications to ensure reproducibility and accuracy of the experimental setup.Stirred Tank Reactor
